response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special price tailored to your needs. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $1,200,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between maximizing the value for you and ensuring a profitable transaction for us. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you require further details to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 1200000}
